title: One Piece Episode 358 Recap: Blazing Knight Sanji!! Kick Down The Fake Wedding
author: The Adult Swim Squad
description: A detailed recap and review of Episode 358, covering the three parallel battles and providing analysis of the comedic and action elements. The reviewer rates the episode 3.5/5 Orange-haired Goddess Princess Angels.

title: Episode 358 - One Piece Wiki
author: One Piece Wiki Contributors
description: Comprehensive wiki page for Episode 358 including plot summary, character appearances, manga chapters adapted, production credits, and trivia.

title: One Piece Episode 358 Discussion
author: FanVerse Community
description: Fan discussion thread from when the episode aired, featuring reactions to the animation quality and pacing. Fans noted repeated animation scenes from previous episodes.

title: The Going Merry: A One Piece Review Podcast - Episodes 357-361
author: The Going Merry Podcast
description: A One Piece review podcast covering episodes 357-361 in a batch, which includes Episode 358. The hosts discuss the crew's efforts to defeat Perona and Brook's backstory connections.

title: Episode 358 - One Piece (IMDb)
author: IMDb
description: IMDb entry for Episode 358 with ratings, cast information, and basic details. The episode has a rating of 7.5/10.

title: Absalom Voice Actors - Behind The Voice Actors
author: BTVA
description: Voice actor information for Absalom including Hiroaki Miura (Japanese) and Andrew Chandler (English) with credits and character information.

title: Perona Voice Actors - Behind The Voice Actors
author: BTVA
description: Voice actor information for Perona including Kumiko Nishihara (Japanese) and Felecia Angelle (English) with credits and character details.

title: Suke Suke no Mi - One Piece Wiki
author: One Piece Wiki Contributors
description: Comprehensive information about the Clear-Clear Fruit including abilities, users (Absalom and later Shiryu), and its significance in the story including Sanji's connection to it.

title: Chapter 463 - One Piece Wiki
author: One Piece Wiki Contributors
description: Wiki page for Chapter 463 'Pirate Sanji vs Mysterious Absalom' which is adapted in Episode 358. Includes plot details and character information.

title: One Piece Thriller Bark Arc Review
author: Hogan Reviews
description: A comprehensive review of the entire Thriller Bark arc (Episodes 337-381), providing context for Episode 358 within the larger arc structure.
